title: ‘We Need to Close the Gap’: Visma-Lease a Bike to Write First Chapter of Redemption Arc at Volta ao Algarve
content:
Vingegaard, Kuss, Van Aert debut at Portuguese tour in first test of Visma’s 2025 quest to reclaim 'super team' superiority in cobbled classics and Tour de France.

Read the full article at ‘We Need to Close the Gap’: Visma-Lease a Bike to Write First Chapter of Redemption Arc at Volta ao Algarve on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
